description: Nothing is more romantic than celebrating the Christmas season with this cocktail recipe. The White Christmas&nbsp;Martini will add up to the Christmas spirit inside your homes in just a few steps!
name: White Christmas Martini
recipeIngredient: Honey and coarse sanding sugar for rim garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Coat the rim of the martini glass with honey before dipping it to the sugar coat.
recipeInstructions.text: Coat the rim of the martini glass with honey before dipping it to the sugar coat.

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker, combine the ingredients along with the ice. Shake vigorously until the shaker becomes slightly frosty.
